And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> another<S>243</S> sign<S>4592</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, great<S>3173</S> and<S>2532</S> marvellous<S>2298</S>, seven<S>2033</S> angels<S>32</S> having<S>2192</S> the seven<S>2033</S> last<S>2078</S> plagues<S>4127</S>; for<S>3754</S> in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S> is filled up<S>5055</S> the wrath<S>2372</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> as it were<S>5613</S> a sea<S>2281</S> of glass<S>5193</S> mingled<S>3396</S> with fire<S>4442</S>: and<S>2532</S> them that had gotten the victory<S>3528</S> over<S>1537</S> the beast<S>2342</S>, and<S>2532</S> over<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> image<S>1504</S>, and<S>2532</S> over<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> mark<S>5480</S>, and over<S>1537</S> the number<S>706</S> of his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>, stand<S>2476</S> on<S>1909</S> the sea<S>2281</S> of glass<S>5193</S>, having<S>2192</S> the harps<S>2788</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they sing<S>103</S> the song<S>5603</S> of Moses<S>3475</S> the servant<S>1401</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the song<S>5603</S> of the Lamb<S>721</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Great<S>3173</S> and<S>2532</S> marvellous<S>2298</S> are thy<S>4675</S> works<S>2041</S>, Lord<S>2962</S> God<S>2316</S> Almighty<S>3841</S>; just<S>1342</S> and<S>2532</S> true<S>228</S> are thy<S>4675</S> ways<S>3598</S>, thou King<S>935</S> of saints<S>40</S>. <sup>saints: or, nations, or, ages</sup>
Who<S>5101</S> shall<S>5399</S> not<S>3364</S> fear<S>5399</S> thee<S>4571</S>, O Lord<S>2962</S>, and<S>2532</S> glorify<S>1392</S> thy<S>4675</S> name<S>3686</S>? for<S>3754</S> thou only<S>3441</S> art holy<S>3741</S>: for<S>3754</S> all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S> shall come<S>2240</S> and<S>2532</S> worship<S>4352</S> before<S>1799</S> thee<S>4675</S>; for<S>3754</S> thy<S>4675</S> judgments<S>1345</S> are made manifest<S>5319</S>.
And<S>2532</S> after<S>3326</S> that<S>5023</S> I looked<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, the temple<S>3485</S> of the tabernacle<S>4633</S> of the testimony<S>3142</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> was opened<S>455</S>:
And<S>2532</S> the seven<S>2033</S> angels<S>32</S> came<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> the temple<S>3485</S>, having<S>2192</S> the seven<S>2033</S> plagues<S>4127</S>, clothed<S>1746</S> in pure<S>2513</S> and<S>2532</S> white<S>2986</S> linen<S>3043</S>, and<S>2532</S> having their breasts<S>4738</S> girded<S>4024</S> with<S>4012</S> golden<S>5552</S> girdles<S>2223</S>.
And<S>2532</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> the four<S>5064</S> beasts<S>2226</S> gave<S>1325</S> unto the seven<S>2033</S> angels<S>32</S> seven<S>2033</S> golden<S>5552</S> vials<S>5357</S> full<S>1073</S> of the wrath<S>2372</S> of God<S>2316</S>, who<S>3588</S> liveth<S>2198</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the temple<S>3485</S> was filled<S>1072</S> with smoke<S>2586</S> from<S>1537</S> the glory<S>1391</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> from<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> power<S>1411</S>; and<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> was able<S>1410</S> to enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>3485</S>, till<S>891</S> the seven<S>2033</S> plagues<S>4127</S> of the seven<S>2033</S> angels<S>32</S> were fulfilled<S>5055</S>.
